channel.title: Swift-Evolution on Andy Ibanez
channel.description: Recent content in Swift-Evolution on Andy Ibanez

item.title: Understanding @dynamicMemberLookup and @dynamicCallable in Swift
item.description: If you have written code in a programming language such as Python or PHP, you can find many direct comparisons to Swift. For one, Swift is statically typed, whereas PHP and Python are not - Swift is considered a safe language as it has a bunch of features to protect you against mistakes - static typing, error throwing, optionality for dealing with nulls, to name a few -, whereas PHP and Python do not.
